Container.Name: deepstack-gpu
Container.Overview:
Build and deploy AI powered applications with in-built and custom AI APIs, all offline and self-hosted. See https://deepstack.cc[br] This container is for use with NVIDIA GPUs. https://deepstack.cc/using-deepstack-with-nvidia-gpus/index.html[br][br]
To use with home assistant see: https://github.com/robmarkcole/HASS-Deepstack-object#hass-deepstack-object
[br][br][b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Nvidia GPU Use[/span][/u][/b][br]Install Unraid Nvidia Plugin to install Nvidia Drivers and[br] add [b]--runtime=nvidia[/b] to [b]"extra parameters"[/b] (switch on advanced view) and[br]copy your [b]GPU UUID[/b] to [b]NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES.[/b]
